explanation:
code_hardening: added a null check for the bytes parameter to avoid NullPointerException and marked the parameter as final to clarify immutability.
resolve_compilation_errors: removed the static modifier and made the method private so it can be used as an instance method within the same class; no external API calls were introduced.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: none; the hex conversion logic and output format are unchanged.
refactoring: changed visibility from public to private, removed static, and replaced StringBuffer with StringBuilder as thread-safety is not required in this context.
misc: kept formatting and naming consistent with the surrounding class style; no new custom API calls were added.
